hero.title: Gargantua Project - Engineering & infrastructure of the future
hero.subtitle: Holding specializing in the deployment of fiber optic networks and charging stations for electric vehicles.

field.title: Our subsidiaries
field.point-1: FTTH - D1, D2 networks, air prints
field.point-6: Tailor -made solutions for communities, companies and private

fibre.title: Why trust us?
fibre.description: With our experience and know-how, we are the ideal partner to support your fiber optics projects with efficiency, responsiveness and expertise.

list.description-1: We undertake to meet your deadlines by ensuring quick and high quality interventions on all your projects.
list.description-2: Our technicians and engineers have more than 12 years of experience in the field of optical fiber and telecom networks.
list.description-3: We collaborate with the main telecom operators, guaranteeing high reliability and performance standards.
list.description-4: We remain available at each step to advise you, adjust solutions and ensure personalized follow -up of your project.

fibre.description-1: Analysis of existing infrastructure, design of fiber solutions adapted to your needs.
fibre.description-2: Complete installation from the main networks to buildings and accommodation.
fibre.description-3: Quick and secure commissioning of optical fiber at your customers.
fibre.description-4: Fast monitoring, maintenance and interventions to ensure the quality of the service.
fibre.description-5: Checks, diagnostics and advice to optimize your networks.

about.title: About Us
about.description-1: Founded in 2013, Gargantua Project is a company based in Bezons, Val d'Oise.
about.description-2: We support public and private actors in the realization of high value -added technical projects
about.description-3: We operate on all stages of fiber deployment with particular expertise on phase D2 (building)
about.point-3: Tailor -made solutions for communities and businesses

contact.title: Contact us
contact.sub-title-2: We would be delighted to help you.
contact.description: Do you have a project or need information?

conceptFibre.title: Fiber concept
conceptFibre.aboutText: Concept Fiber is our innovative approach to fiber optic technology, designed to meet growing requests for modern connectivity.
conceptFibre.missionText: Our mission is to provide advanced optical fiber solutions that transform the way people connect, work and live in the digital age.
conceptFibre.contactText: Do you want to know more about Concept Fiber?

project.title: Our achievements
project.description: We had the privilege of collaborating with operators and prestigious customers on major projects in the field of optical fiber.
